about_intro_1: 70,000 years ago, the Cognitive Revolution made us human. Today, in the age of AI, it's time for the second Cognitive Leap.
about_intro_2: Forget 11 years at a desk. Our game-based platform allows you to master the school curriculum in 2-3 years, using engaging 2D games, as well as Minecraft and Roblox worlds.
about_body_1: Traditional school is a conveyor belt that treats everyone the same, killing the joy of discovery. Cognitive Leap is the alternative. We replace the conveyor belt with a personal GPS for knowledge. Instead of grade levels, we have a map of 260 topics linked by logic, not by a schedule. Our system builds a unique and faster learning path for every student.
about_body_2: We don't create lessons from scratch; we curate the best educational content from around the world, from YouTube lectures to interactive simulations.
about_invitation_intro: Education is an ecosystem, and we invite you to build it with us.
about_text_parents: Help us turn learning into a thrilling adventure by finding the best content to unlock your child's potential.
about_text_educators: Break free from the routine. Let our platform handle the basics, so you can focus on what truly matters: mentoring and inspiring students. Become a lead curator for your subject.
about_conclusion: Let's take this cognitive leap together and build the education our children deserve.
